website_summaries.verdict: Made of 70% preshrunk merino wool, these thick and cozy tall socks are comfortable enough for lounging and durable enough for outdoor activities.
pros: Available in a range of sizes – including men’s and kid's – and colors
Socks boast a thick and durable design
These provide impressive warmth and comfort
Since they’re made of preshrunk wool, they’re safe to put in the dryer
cons: These socks run large in size

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I am wearing cashmere socks
customer_reviews.text: I first read some reviews on these socks and one said they fall down, so I bought the XLR version of these socks. I liked the XLR socks but they are bulky and I wear them with my boots, I again looked at these and so glad I did. They are not like the negative review I read and stay up and they feel like I am wearing cashmere socks and very warm and comfortable. I thought I ordered the red, but ordered the navy blue but still would not exchange them now that I have them.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure its for 30 below but Definitely for 50 below
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my pops. He is a senior but has said that he enjoys the socks and that are better than the average wool sock he uses. He lives near the mountains and gets a lot of snow in the winter. He did say he feels the warmth better than other options but that once it gets into the 30s and 20's that he can occasionally still feel the cold
customer_reviews.author: Th3 Krack3n

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: The 30 below Merino socks are like a miracle. I've been fighting cold feet and legs for more than 20 years. I've tried double socks, an electric blanket, an electrics foot warming platform, "Hothands" foot warmers, and a microwavable rice-filled warming pad. I've even tried wearing my Sorel boots around the clock while in the house. Nothing worked. Until the Merino wool socks. I still occasionally have to use a heating pad to get my feet warm after being in the cold for extended period, but for normal days, these socks have eliminated my cold foot problems. I'll be buying more and using them daily throughout the cold months of the year.
customer_reviews.author: dewey

customer_reviews.title: Way too large, and saggy within 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. We ordered the Medium for our son, who wears a men's size 8. They arrived labeled Medium, but were definitely large. They slid onto my size 10.5 (US) feet easy, and within half an hour were saggy. Sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Long

customer_reviews.title: sizing is totally wrong
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mother but I could see right off that they would be way to big for her. I didn't return them because I thought my husband could wear them. WRONG! They are way to big for him also. So I will just donate them. I would have returned them but my husband tried to wear a pair of them.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Knight

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay up
customer_reviews.text: Elastic will not hold up, the sock ends up in a ball at the bottom of my boots, causeing me to stand on lumps all day. I would not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Betsill

customer_reviews.title: So I am not pleased with these socks to keep my feet warm
customer_reviews.text: I live in the U.P of Michigan And wanted a pair of socks that would keep my feet warm. With the temps in the teens on Christmas eve day I went for a 5 mile walk with my dog and about 1.5 hr later my feet got very cold with these socks on. even with 800 gr insulated boots on. So I am not pleased with these socks to keep my feet warm. I guess I will look at other socks for the colder winter here in the U.P.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these socks before in a store and I LOVE them, but the sizing of this listing is WAY off (or I got the wrong item) - I ordered the Women's 5-9 and the are huge and shapeless. I cannot even keep them on my feet - they are like leg warmers that a closed at one end and have no stretch to stay on/up. Unwearable. Bummer because I got a three pack.
customer_reviews.author: EmD

customer_reviews.title: Warm but falls down
customer_reviews.text: These socks are really warm. They have good cushioning. They lack extra elastic around the foot and ankle causing them to fall down. When I wear them with my lace up boots they are ok but if I wear them with my slip on boots they fall down after walking a short distance.
customer_reviews.author: SGibler

customer_reviews.title: Mid foot shrinks, socks shed and pill a bit
customer_reviews.text: The socks begin to pill at the first washing, also the mid section of tbe foot shrinks where the ribbing is and now they are too tight and squeeze my feet. They might work well for someone with narrow feet. I cant use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Oliver

customer_reviews.title: You will never go looking for socks again.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best socks out there. I have poor circulation, and always cold feet. It was not uncommon for me to wear 3-5 pairs of socks at a time while I was out fishing. I now wear one pair of these no matter what conditions. -20 to 75 degrees my feet are ALWAYS comfortable. I am not used to ever having warm feet, and when I discovered these I bought 6 more. I will keep buying them as long as they are being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Therrien

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm in the snow!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 6.5 in women's and I got a 3 pack of the size small, and they fit nicely. They didn't get too loose after wearing them all day. They kept me warm in the snow for hours and throughout a range of 25-40 degrees Fahrenheit.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Young

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable winter socks
customer_reviews.text: These Canadian-made winter socks are ideal for the coldest days; and they fit well, too, with smooth toe seams that dramatically increase wearing comfort over long periods. The secret to their warmth-enhancing qualities has to do with very tightly knitted pile--this lofty weave holds more air near the skin, which in turn insulates your feet very effectively when they need it most. And the fact that these socks are essentially made from soft wool is a definite improvement over the many synthetics available from other manufacturers. Canadians know how to protect themselves from the cold. Buying these excellent J.B. Field Icelandic socks is the logical purchase equivalent to acquiring an English umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: MacMaster

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my feet and have been trying different brands of winter socks that keep my feet warm but aren't too tight after being washed. The Icelandic brand are the only ones I've found yet that stay up but don't get tight after being washed, size 13-16. If you buy from Amazon you have to read and make sure you're getting the Icelandic brand that have the name on the socks.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but irritating and in need of changes
customer_reviews.text: They’re definitely warm, as advertised, but 2 stars because the elastic in these is awful so you end up being uncomfortable with cold ankles and calves. Kind of defeats their purpose, so I only wore them for 1 season and tossed them out. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Seph H.

customer_reviews.title: Frozen feet
customer_reviews.text: Work in a meat room at 25* my feet still freeze. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Droopy
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great wearing around the house but they don't have a lot of elastic so they slip down. Very warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are wonderful. They are smooth on the outside but have a pleasing fuzziness inside. They seem to be very top quality. They are thick but still fit with my normal shoes with no problem. Of course I'm sure this is dependant on ones shoes. Best of all they keep my feet warm. I wear them day and night and after my first order of 3 pair I ordered 6 more! For the winter I will wear no other socks. By the way they come in many colors but I found the red to be a nice bright traditional red and perfect for these socks. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chas. Brunner

customer_reviews.title: back for more
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most comfortable socks I've worn, and I've been a Smart Wool fan for years (still am). Yes, they do not stay up, but for some reason this has not bothered me at all. I don't even notice it. So, after trying these out this fall, I'm back for another 3 pair. The price is right, especially compared to Smart Wool, and my feet will be warm all winter. If you are worried about wool being itchy, I have very sensitive skin, and you would never know these socks have any wool in them at all. They also launder very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend for extreme cold
customer_reviews.text: The socks are fine and warm for moderate to cold weather but they didn’t keep my feet as warm as it’s advertised in extreme cold. I wouldn’t recommend spending $10 on one pair.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: I have a problem with fmy legs. I need ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with fmy legs. I need heat old the time on legs and in summer when is air condition on my legs are freezing so this sock saves me trouble. So for me it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sock in the Cold
customer_reviews.text: This type of sock is great for winter wear. Don't expect to be comfortable in these socks with crappy shoes though, these alone will not keep your feet warm. These are about standard for a merino wool sock. The one draw back is that the tops of the sock do not keep the socks up your calf. The socks slide down and can become loose on your foot, thus causing uncomfortable bunching under your foot. I can snug my shoelaces around the tops of my boots to keep them in place fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: TFox3

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cozy, and WARM! Keeps the toes warm, love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I find these earlier in life? My feet and toes have always been cold during the winter. I would always wear two pairs of socks but still they'd be cold. First day I put these on, my toes stayed warm! Super soft and comfortable, goes high enough on the leg to stay without sliding down. Truly amazing! Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Miller

customer_reviews.title: NOT 100% merino wool socks
customer_reviews.text: Only 70% merino wool, 30% nylon. I need 100% merino wool. Will wash and hope it will shrank a little to fit my Feet.
customer_reviews.author: wawa yellow

customer_reviews.title: First time trying the Icelandic socks in below zero weather.
customer_reviews.text: Being a long time diabetic my feet have become sensitive to the cold. I Purchase these new socks after doing some research. The Stars rating from other people confince me to try them. This week in New England we seen below zero temperatures. Having to have to take my dog out in this weather these socks did not disappoint me. My feet felt warm and well protected. Most importantly they did not cause the feet pain that I sometimes get from these extreme cold temperatures. now I just hope they will wear well and I can get a few seasons out of The 6 pairs that I have purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Very warm socks and priced to sell.
customer_reviews.text: Very warm socks and priced to sell. I bought these for cold weather hunting and they don't fail to meet my challenge. I have had less problems with sweat, and they keep my feet nice and toasty. I have used these as cold as 0 degrees with no other layers of socks and my feet stayed warm for 4+ hours of sitting in the stand.
customer_reviews.author: IndyTom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty warm!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are pretty darn warm, but I think I would need some extra layers before I went hiking in -30 degree conditions. Perhaps worn with the right boots and sock liners, you could pull off a -30 degree hike. I will update this review if I ever test these socks in those conditions. With regard to the fit and comfort, these socks are some of my best. In fact, sometimes I wish they weren't so warm so I could wear them around more often. They really are nice socks and I would recommend them to anyone who loves to hike in cooler or cold weather, even if it's wet and cold.
customer_reviews.author: MFFunmaker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Only wore these by themselves in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Only wore these by themselves in my insulated boots in single digits and as long as you are moving some they preform well. Definitely would be too hot in the forties.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: These didn't hold up to my expectations--they're a little too ...
customer_reviews.text: These didn't hold up to my expectations--they're a little too loose and stretch out with wear (I'm a size 8 women's and got the medium women's 5-9)--so I haven't found them as effective as the tighter socks that I already own. They're very comfy as house socks, but I won't be wearing them for outdoor activities as planned as they take up too much space in my boot.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: These keep my kids warm. Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Gosh my kids thanked me profusely for upgrading socks! Farming in the midwest is brutal in January!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Feet Warmers
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with cold feet, even indoors. These socks kept my feet warm without making them sweat
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay up
customer_reviews.text: I am thinking about returning these socks. They are just okay. My biggest complaint is that they won't stay up. The one pair I have tried for a few days just won't stay up. That's a big issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Warm Your Feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who works outdoors. He loves them and says they are very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, but HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these socks for my mom who always complains her feet are cold. She is size 6 1/2, I bought these socks in Medium (women shoe size "5-9"). The socks arrived and are good for my husband (size 10 1/2). But the socks are very soft and warm. So I kept them and ordered the Small size (women shoe size "2-6"). There are perfect! I should have paid more attention to the other reviewers...
customer_reviews.author: Julia R

customer_reviews.title: Warm but didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: They are warm and comfy, but one of the pairs wore out and got holes in the heel part, after just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Garg

customer_reviews.title: No more frozen toes
customer_reviews.text: So you may be aware that Boston has had a rough winter. I am a commuter by way of the MBTA and there is a lot of walking during my commute and outside waiting for my train. My feet were freezing until I received these socks. Paired with my Bogs that I also purchased through Amazon my feet are toasty warm. I love these socks. They are a bit thick so you need room in your boots other than that I am so pleased with them. No more frozen toes!
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Very good socks. Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very good socks. Just what I was looking for. Elastic top does not cut off your circulation, nice soft pile inside and warm.
customer_reviews.author: RB Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really Baggy all around
customer_reviews.text: The warmth is nice, but the fit is awful. Are they supposed to fit so loosely? Does one have to buy small instead of med? Bought according to shoe size for male.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure they are good for 30 below and the elastic starts wearing down around the calf quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: WInter Socks
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these socks a week or so but they are certainly better than the thin white socks I was using. I mainly use these socks around the house instead of slippers and they keep my feet warm very well. I occasionally play winter golf but haven't had the chance to try them out yet on the course. 4 stars for now until I give them a try in a round of winter golf and see how they hold up durability wise.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: These socks were perfect for a skiing trip. Very plushy ad warm. These were a perfect fit and I stayed warm while skiing in Colorado
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm Your Toes!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great - I spend a great deal of time in cold weather - very warm and super comfortable to wear. They wash up great with no color fade or shrinking. I used to buy the LL Bean ragg wool socks, but these are much, much better. The LL Bean socks aren't worth buying anymore - save your money.
customer_reviews.author: John Graham

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will not keep your feet warm even at 30 deg. above
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Grateful to have them
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was grateful to have them. They are not good solo with snow boots in -20. These were soft and got us through. Our feet were still a little cold in -18 with snow boots and I had to dry them by the fire every night. My 7 yr old's pair was worn and thinned out in the toe after 3 days of low activity wearing. The fleece socks I got them were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable socks I own, Keeps your feet warm & toasty all winter long.
customer_reviews.author: Doug P

customer_reviews.title: Wool warm without the itch.
customer_reviews.text: Great sock, warm. I have a problem keeping my feet warm due to circulation. Put a liner under these to help with sweat. My feet stayed warm all day. They stay up and no itch even for wool sensitive feet.
customer_reviews.author: space pen

customer_reviews.title: Love Merino wool socks
customer_reviews.text: Love Merino wool socks, fit well, wash great . Not itchy, they feel great on your skin very comfortable. They work extremely well in sub xero temperatures and keep your feet dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Durable Sock
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on the hunt for warm (or warmer) socks and gloves, as I'm often working outside in the winter weather. These socks are pretty decent, but when the temps hit the teens, I use toe warmers. Decently priced, and definitely a quality product. Surprisingly, I've found the Heat Holders socks to be the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mail Debaser

customer_reviews.title: -30 Below Extreme Cold Winter Socks
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. Wore these for winter bushcrafting and my feet never got cold. Also wear these when deer hunting. My favorite winter socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: the Sox was bigger than I expected, but definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: the Sox was bigger than I expected, but definitely what I needed – they substitute for bedroom slippers and keep my feet cozy, which is very important for a diabetic.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta B. Deloggio

customer_reviews.title: These socks do not work as claimed to -30F.
customer_reviews.text: These socks claim to keep your feet warm to -30F. Walked dogs on trail for 3.7 miles in 0 degree Fahrenheit weather. These socks did not keep feet warm at 0 degrees F. Really disappointed as I had hoped they would work. Purchased woman's size 5-9 and I wear an 8 1/2 to 9 shoe and they were way too large could have went down 2 sizes.
customer_reviews.author: SMM

customer_reviews.title: 3 Pair -30 Below winter socks. . . . .
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my adult son and he said they keep sliding down his leg. There is no elastic at the top to hold up the socks on your leg he said.
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace. . . .

customer_reviews.title: would repurchase if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present that was so good my son asked for more! Unfortunately they aren't available now but hopefully more will come in. They were liked so much my son asked for more. I wish i could get them.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie S

customer_reviews.title: Keep your toes warm
customer_reviews.text: My feet are always cold but when I wear these at night, my feet are warm.
customer_reviews.author: KillerBebe

customer_reviews.title: Socks are for Father who suffers from cold feet at night..
customer_reviews.text: Socks keep fathers feet much warmer at night. Very soft.. I also took an old pair of socks, filled them with hard rice and heat in the microwave for 2-4 minutes. With the 30 below winter socks and the warmed up rice or corn filled socks his feet are toasty warm at night. These are the warmest socks I have found for him..
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Jo

customer_reviews.title: Ready for cool weather
customer_reviews.text: These socks are very nice. Warm and cozy. I have in past been troubled with how they launder, as previous on got very fuzzy on the outside following a few washes. Will wait to see about that with these new ones. I am sure I will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pa Tomcat

customer_reviews.title: -30 Extreme Cold Winter Socks
customer_reviews.text: The socks are warm but the Women's size 5-9 runs large. The toe of the socks are extremly big and bulky in my shoes. Other than the toe being overly large the rest of the sock is ok. The socks do not shrink up like some wool socks and they stay very soft after many washings. If they sold a smaller size in the women's size I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks
customer_reviews.text: Even thought they're somewhat large, I love them. I ordered them just in the nick of time since we have had freezing temperatures and 12 inches of snow for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like my feet have never been warmed before
customer_reviews.text: For once in my life I have socks to warm my feet, like my feet have never been warmed before. I've tried many other brands that did not measure up to the comfort and warmth as this Brand. The socks are a five (5) star plus, you can't go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice but temps below 10 seemed not to do so ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice but temps below 10 seemed not to do so well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be 3 colors with the three pairs but all came in denim, other than that, very happy
customer_reviews.author: 👋

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm
customer_reviews.text: Get cold toes, not with these. Not the most fashionable, kind of like 70’s tube socks - but who needs fashion when you’re toes are warm during the polar vortex?
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: These are truly great socks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent socks, very comfortable, great for outdoor work or indoor comfort if you have cold extremities. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn Skaalvard

customer_reviews.title: Very warm but not wind proof
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. They go about half way up your shin and are actually very very soft on the inside. Good build quality and fit my feet very well. They are not wind proof so if you need these for biking in cold weather, I recommend pairing them up with windproof purpose built socks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Aragon

customer_reviews.title: These are nice socks, very warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are nice socks, very warm and comfy....however, they shrink down to an ankle sock size when washed and dried....once dry, they DO stretch back out if you pull on them firmly...almost elastic!
customer_reviews.author: AM Davis

customer_reviews.title: Extra warm
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an avid hunter. He always complains about frozen toes. I bought these socks and when he got home this time, he said, "My feet are sweating! Talk about warm socks, I think my feet lost weight!"
customer_reviews.author: TERESA STARRETT

customer_reviews.title: These are GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, extremely comfortable, I have long worn red socks as a sort of Rockin'Rod trademark and these are the best I've ever had!!! Probably buy more, although I have 6 pairs as of now. But you can never be too rich or own too many red socks...IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Rod

customer_reviews.title: keep my feet warm.
customer_reviews.text: moveed from Texas to Nebraska Try these out because no other socks war can to keep my feet warm Their work so good ordered another 3 pair
customer_reviews.author: Worgan

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and comfortable. I only wish I could find this exact ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and comfortable. I only wish I could find this exact sock in knee-length.
customer_reviews.author: Elise R

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my toes toasty. People complain about them sliding down, if you wear boots that doesn't happen. My go to winter sock.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Garmoe

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: I live on the gulf coast and I decided to take a winter vacation to the northwest. I needed to stock up on some winter attire. I researched everything from thermals to socks and ended up buying these -30 below socks. Glad I did...it was crazy cold but me and my feet stayed warm and dry. Great cold weather socks!
customer_reviews.author: Darlinggoat

customer_reviews.title: Not for long term use
customer_reviews.text: After about one week they started stretching out and losing their elasticity so they were bundling up in my shoe. Did keep my feet warm enough to have sweaty toes at times.
customer_reviews.author: My wife and I

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks!
customer_reviews.text: I have tested these socks this hunting season and they have performed very well. I was shocked how much better they did compared to some carhart socks I had been wearing the last few years. These will be my go-to socks for when the temperature drops to freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy B

customer_reviews.title: They FIT!
customer_reviews.text: They fit Big Foot, my grandson and his size 13 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: too large.. sag
customer_reviews.text: These socks will not stay up or stay on my feet. The sag off. The warmth ok at about 30 degrees can't see it keeping my feet warm at 30 below. I can't recommend them. They come large and ended up fitting a man large instead of a women med.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet!
customer_reviews.text: The price you pay for this product is worth it. I got the 3 pair for my husband so he could wear them for our New York and Iceland trip (November). He said they were very effective, it served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: serioushopper

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of these sock. very warm and soft, exactly what I need for Alaska winter. I will purchase some more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Grubbyhaze

customer_reviews.title: they seem to be good as I clean snow I will tell you better ...
customer_reviews.text: they seem to be good as I clean snow I will tell you better wright now if I have them on with out shoes my feet still sweat thanks
customer_reviews.author: russell bechard

customer_reviews.title: Not warm Elastic band doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: They are not warm as advertised, and the elastic band at the top is very loose and the sock will slide down your foot. Even with two pairs on they are still not warm. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: thomas ford

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Warm
customer_reviews.text: The fit was correct for the size I ordered, and the socks are very warm so far. I have not worn them outside yet, but I have a problem with circulation and my feet get cold indoors as well. Not with these socks though. They have kept my feet warm indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatius J. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Snug
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderfully warm socks for an elderly person with persistently cold feet. The socks also keep the legs warm and snug.
customer_reviews.author: mollymccallmcclammy

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but loose
customer_reviews.text: I am a size US 8.5 and ordered accordingly. I would definitely go down a size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped for, thick, warm and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Thank Goodness for Amazon..Santa came for my husband on time..
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product and service of Amazon. I was looking for my husband some warm socks for Christmas. I found them on here , and they was delivered as promissed. Thanks so much. I will continue to shop here. Oh Yes, the socks keeps his feet warm as promised too. Thanks, Wanda Teague, Thomasville,n.c.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Teague

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks soooooo much I bought them for family ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks soooooo much I bought them for family and friends for Christmas gifts! Great QUALITY! I plow and sitting in a vehicle with cold floor boards....theses are great, in the vehicle and out walking/trudging through the snow!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond S. Detor Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellente socks, keep hot in the tend and the weather near 0 degrees celsius almost 32 F
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Lee

customer_reviews.title: keeps my ice cold feet warm
customer_reviews.text: It's good but not as good as Wigwam 40 below. Those really were warm and comfy. Maybe cuz of the material, I'm not sure. But these aren't bad for the price, but I still feel my feet being cold in them. I'll try something else cheaper and warmer and write more later.
customer_reviews.author: Optimistic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used these when camping in GA. They did the job keeping my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelle

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Pretty warm... although when its -8 there is only so much you can do. However, I am very happy with this purchase. In fact I'm wearing them right now, since my desk sits on a cold tile floor in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: TRaz1984

customer_reviews.title: VERY warm and wash beautifully.  I line dried.
customer_reviews.text: Toasty WARM. Soft. Washable. Concerned about threads inside near toe but will see how they wear. Overall very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Spudich

customer_reviews.title: I WEAR these instead of slippers!
customer_reviews.text: They feel good and keep my feet warm even on a cold hard wood floor. I tend to buy slightly larger shoes so I can wear a heavy sock -so I have no problem with these. Merino Wool will hold up for a long time, so worth the investment. I wear them all winter!
customer_reviews.author: dogloverAR

customer_reviews.title: these are nice warm socks
customer_reviews.text: These feel a little loose around my foot by the end of the day. The need some elastic around the arch of the foot to help keep them from bunching up. Otherwise, these are nice warm socks.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks! I have tile in my house and the floor can be very cold. These socks keep our feet perfectly warm! (I've bought them for other members of my family and we all love them!)
customer_reviews.author: Mary Durst

customer_reviews.title: Great Socks, great price, well made!?
customer_reviews.text: Great socks, very thick and comfortable. They keep my feet very warm around the house and very comfortable while wearing my boots. My new best friends!
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: perfect socks
customer_reviews.text: best socks anyone could ever own . soft and comfortable . very warm . fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: t.m.sailor

customer_reviews.title: I do like how they keep my feet warm
customer_reviews.text: The description says you get 3 pair of socks. I only received 1 pair of socks. Where are my other 2 pair??? I do like how they keep my feet warm, but I want what I paid for. I don't want to return them I just want my other 2 pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: hello boy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, not itchy
customer_reviews.text: warm, comfortable, not itchy. I ordered the extra small and they fit great. They don't fall down. I'm a size 5 in women's
customer_reviews.author: Linda Martin

customer_reviews.title: The socks really "sag" and loose their shape very easily, I won't purchase them again
customer_reviews.text: The socks really "sag" and loose their shape very easily, I won't purchase them again. In fact I gave two pair to Goodwill
customer_reviews.author: flcnplt

customer_reviews.title: Great except colors
customer_reviews.text: Great socks. Wish however you could choose your colors and not get variety packs. Hate men's red socks but they are comfortable and fairly warm.
customer_reviews.author: Casual2u

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are Great! l like them, they dry fast after washing too!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Perreault

product_meta.title: 3 PAIR -30 BELOW THERMAL WINTER SOCKS (MERINO WOOL)
product_meta.description: The J.B. Field’s 30 Below Classic is the best selling winter sock in Canada and our most popular sock. DON'T BE FOOLED BY CHEAP IMITATIONS THESE SOCKS ARE AMAZING QUALITY MADE FROM 70% WOOL. We urge all our customers to just buy one pair and see why! This line was designed for people who require a sock which can keep their feet dry, warm, and comfortable in the most extreme conditions. However for anyone engaged in winter sports such as skiing and snowboarding please check out our J.B. Field's Ski and Snow II Sock or knee length version of these. We are so confident that you will like our socks all of them come with our No Risk Guarantee, best of all they are made here in North America! For more colors and other styles please see our other listing(s) under the "Sox Shop". Check out our newly developed Thermal Hiker II socks! Similar to the -30 below socks they are perfect for cold weather activities and only $10 a pair!
feature_bullets: Pre-Shrunk Merino Wool - Merino Wool is the finest quality of easy care wool for exceptional warmth and softness. Wool features inherent qualities such as wrinkle resistance, colorfastness, shape recovery (resiliency), and is very breathable
X-Hi Cushion - XHi full terry cushion for added comfort, extra warmth, and protection
Please note that ONLY the Large size are plain and DO NOT have any writing (ICELANDIC OR LINE ACROSS TOE) on them!
THE -30 BELOW XLR SOCKS ARE IDENTICAL TO THESE BUT THEY HAVE A BETTER CUFF (WON'T SLOUCH) & ARE NOT SOLID COLOR (MIXED WITH BLACK)
